high_descs: Turn right and head straight, then hang left towards the desk.
Pick up pepper shaker from the desk
Turn right and head straight, then hang left towards the desk lamp.
anns.task_desc: Examine a pepper shaker by the light of a desk lamp.

high_descs: walk around and reach the desk
pick up the peppershaker from desk
turn left and turn back to desklamp
anns.task_desc: pick up peppershaker from desk and turn on the desklamp

high_descs: Turn left to reach the desk.
Pick up the pepper shaker from the desk.
Turn left to reach the desk lamp.
anns.task_desc: Examine the pepper shaker under the lamp light.
